author: frankwiz
content: is it possible to bridge from goerli E to sepolia E?

author: abcoathup
content:
I doubt there is much need for Goerli testnet ETH.
Goerli testnet is deprecated (and currently not finalizing): https://blog.ethereum.org/2023/11/30/goerli-lts-update
There are faucets for Sepolia testnet ETH (and supply should not be an issue): https://sepolia-faucet.pk910.de/
